name: DxSale Network
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: DxSale is a decentralized, cross chain, token management platform as a service. DxSale DAO allows for seamless onboarding of chains to provide tools to facilitate and grow out a chains ecosystem.
